unnormalised: AI amchi nokri ghetele, te mhunntale. Aata mhaka fakt hi vaat polloyta ki tech missing semicolon sodhtole ani mhaka 3 hours nakat mhunn. Kiteak v2.0 yetana chai pan kortolo?
normalised: A-Te mhajeo nokreo ghetleleo, mhunn tannim sanglem. Atam hanv fakt taka ek ghallichem semicolon miss zal'lean tin voram khorch korchea bodlek mhojea codache bug kadhunk wat polloitatam. Kiteak mhunn version don point zero lokan tea bodlek chai korunk zata?
text: AI amchi nokri ghetele, te mhunntale. Aata mhaka fakt hi vaat polloyta ki tech missing semicolon sodhtole ani mhaka 3 hours nakat mhunn. Kiteak v2.0 yetana chai pan kortolo?
